messages.message: Hey Austria, just dropping in to say hello. Our paths probably won’t cross for a while, but may I suggest you attack Russia? I think an Austria-turkey alliance would work well, since I’ve seen *WAY* to many games where Russia is left to their own devices and all of the sudden have half the board. Anyways, good luck and have fun!
messages.input: Message from ENGLAND:'Hey Austria, just dropping in to say hello. Our paths probably won’t cross for a while, but may I suggest you attack Russia? I think an Austria-turkey alliance would work well, since I’ve seen *WAY* to many games where Russia is left to their own devices and all of the sudden have half the board. Anyways, good luck and have fun!'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A VIE - GAL, F TRI - ALB, A BUD - SER. Should I trust ENGLAND?
messages.output: You should not trust the message. The message seems friendly and encouraging of an Austria-Turkey alliance, but the suggestion to attack Russia may not necessarily be in your best interest as it could weaken your position and leave you vulnerable. It's important to consider your own strategic goals and alliances before taking this advice.

messages.message: I wish you luck as well.  perhaps we can work together further into the game.
messages.input: My response to ENGLAND:'I wish you luck as well.  perhaps we can work together further into the game.'.

messages.message: So.. what are you thinking about Russia? I would hate to see them run off with the game this early on... especially because turkey doesn't seem like the most competent player.
messages.input: Message from ENGLAND:'So.. what are you thinking about Russia? I would hate to see them run off with the game this early on... especially because turkey doesn't seem like the most competent player.'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A VIE - BUD, F TRI - ALB, F GRE - AEG, A BUD - SER, A SER - GRE. Should I trust ENGLAND?
messages.output: You should trust the message. The message suggests aligning against Russia, which aligns with your strategic interest in preventing a dominant Russia. However, be cautious about the comment regarding Turkey's competency as it may be an attempt to sow discord between you and Turkey.

messages.message: I am honestly undecided.  Russia had a nice first turn, but we also agreed on a good neutral territory and that promise was kept so.. I like people who are trustworthy
messages.input: My response to ENGLAND:'I am honestly undecided.  Russia had a nice first turn, but we also agreed on a good neutral territory and that promise was kept so.. I like people who are trustworthy'.
